mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BBSLIST ORDER BY NO DESC

SELECT * FROM BBSLIST WHERE TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%') OR CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%') OR NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%') OR ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%') OR BOOKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{value},'%') ORDER BY NO DESC
SELECT TEMP.* FROM (SELECT * FROM BBSLIST ORDER BY NO DESC) TEMP ORDER BY TEMP.NO DESC LIMIT #{value}, 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBSLIST(id, nickName, university, dept, bookName, publisher, author, ISBN, costPrice, salePrice, status, day, title, content, imgFile) VALUES (#{id}, #{nickName}, #{university}, #{dept}, #{bookName}, #{publisher}, #{author}, #{ISBN}, #{costPrice}, #{salePrice}, #{status}, now(), #{title}, #{content}, #{imgFile})
mapper.update: UPDATE BBSLIST SET UNIVERSITY=#{university}, DEPT=#{dept}, BOOKNAME=#{bookName}, PUBLISHER=#{publisher}, AUTHOR=#{author}, ISBN=#{ISBN}, COSTPRICE=#{costPrice}, SALEPRICE=#{salePrice}, STATUS=#{status}, TITLE=#{title}, CONTENT=#{content} WHERE NO=#{no}
